Text with Background can be added to any Page to enhance your page content. Customization options are available for background color, background pattern, and full or content width backgrounds.

View all background color and pattern combinations

Accessibile Color Combinations

It's up to YOU to ensure text colors are legible on your selected background color! We created a handy tool for you to see which brand colors pass the accessibility guidelines.

View our color accessibility tool and check the "Hide inaccessible color combinations." box.

Examples

Background Color: River

Background Pattern: None

Full-width: Checked

Text is the most common type of Page element. It can do wonderful things like style text, embed images and files, make lists, and add tables and grids. Below are some examples of what this "What You See is What You Get" (WYSIWYG) editor can do.

Background Color: Midnight

Background Pattern: Triangles Right

Full-width: Not checked
